Main pronunciation 主要发音: zōng

Other pronunciations 其它发音: Not exists.

Original meaning 本义: Meaning pot。 draw the feet up; to refuse to advance, to summarize; to gather; to collect, name of an old country, (same as U+9350 鍐) a headstall; ornament on a bridle; (Cant.) to jump up

鬷字的基本解释

鬷
zōng
古代的一种釜。
古通“总”，聚集：“鬷六校之飞将。”
姓。

鬷字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zōng］
［《廣韻》子紅切，平東，精。］
［《廣韻》作孔切，上董，精。］
亦作“1”。
(1)釜的一种。
(2)通“奏”。奏进。参见“鬷假”。
(3)通“總”。会聚。
(4)姓。春秋有鬷蔑。见《左传·襄公二十五年》。

鬷字的康熙字典解释

【亥集上】【鬲字部】　鬷； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页1459第27
【唐韻】子紅切【集韻】【韻會】祖叢切，?音葼。【說文】釜屬也。　又【詩·?風】越以鬷邁。【傳】鬷，數也。【疏】鬷謂麻縷，毎數一升而用繩紀之，故鬷爲數也。　又【詩·商頌】鬷假無言。【傳】總也。○按《中庸》引《詩》作奏假。　又地名。【後漢·郡國志】隮隂郡定陶有三鬷亭。【註】湯伐三鬷。　又姓。【左傳·昭二十九年】昔有飂叔安，有裔子曰董父實，甚好龍，以服事帝舜。帝賜之姓曰董氏，曰豢龍，封諸鬷川，鬷夷氏其後也。　又【廣韻】作孔切【集韻】【正韻】祖動切，?音摠。草名。【爾雅·釋草】素華軌鬷。　又【集韻】作弄切，音糉。漢侯國名。○按《前漢·王子侯年表》作鬷，音悾。又子弄反，又子公反。

Basic explanation of words
kettle on legs
zōng
An ancient cauldron.
Gu Tong "general", gather: "the pilots of the six schools."
name.
kettle on legs
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zōng］
["Guangyun" sub-red cut, flat east, fine. ]
["Guangyun" made Kongqie, Shangdong, Jing. ]
Also called "1".
(1) A kind of kettle.
(2) Through "play". Play in. See "Fake".
(3) Through "general". Converge.
(4) Last name. There is slander in Spring and Autumn. See "Twenty-five Years of Zuo Zhuan·Xianggong".
kettle on legs
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Haiji 1】【Feizi Department】　鬷; Kangxi Strokes: 19; Page Number: Page 1459 Page 27
[Tang Yun] Zihong cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Ancestral Cong cut,? Yin Feng. [Said the text] Cauldron is also.　[Poetry·? Wind] The more I step forward. [Biography] 鬷, count also. [Sparse] 鬷 is called hemp thread, every liter is counted with rope, so 鬷 is also a number.　[Poem·Commercial Song] False and silent. [Biography] Zong Ye. ○According to "The Doctrine of the Mean" to quote "The Poem" as a memorial.　Also place name. [The History of the Later Han Dynasty] There are three pavilions in Dingtao, Kuanyin County. 【Note】Tangfa Sansi.　Another last name. [Zuo Zhuan · Zhao 29th] In the past, there was Bian Shuan, and the descent son called Dong Fushi, a very good dragon, to serve Emperor Shun. The surname bestowed by the emperor is called Dong's family, and it is called "Fulong".　 [Guang Yun] made hole cutting [Ji Yun] [Zheng Yun] The ancestor moved cutting,? Yin 摠. Cursive name. 【Erya·Shucao】Suhua Railroad.　 [Ji Yun] Fooling and cutting, sound 糉. The name of the Hou Han. ○According to the "Previous Han·Prince Hou Chronicles" as a list, the sound is unreliable. You Zi reversed, and Zi Gong reversed.
